context: Pure Storage IPO year (2015). All-flash enterprise storage company entering the market dominated by traditional storage giants. At IPO, Pure Storage was competing against established players in the enterprise storage market, offering innovative all-flash storage arrays for high-performance enterprise environments.

competitors.name: Dell EMC
competitors.notes: The 800 pound gorilla in the storage world. #1 competitor with broad portfolio of storage solutions including PowerMax and Unity XT series

competitors.name: NetApp
competitors.notes: Major competitor providing storage solutions with AFF series, focusing on performance, efficiency, and cloud integration

competitors.name: IBM
competitors.notes: Competitor with FlashSystem portfolio offering high-speed storage solutions

competitors.name: Hitachi Vantara
competitors.notes: Enterprise storage leader with Virtual Storage Platform series, emphasis on reliability and performance

competitors.name: HPE
competitors.notes: Competitor with 3PAR storage solutions for enterprise workloads
